test.name: Create And Save Note

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Element Count
kw.doc: Returns the number of elements matching ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: Adding note with title: Test Note
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Test Note' into text field 'css=[data-testid='note-title-input']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'This is a test note' into text field 'css=[data-testid='note-content-input']'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Set Variable If
kw.doc: Sets variable based on the given condition.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Element Should Be Visible
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//h3[contains(text(), 'Test Note')]/ancestor::div[contains(@data-testid, 'note-')]//p[contains(@data-testid, 'note-content-') and contains(text(), 'This is a test note')]' is displayed.
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Match Regexp
kw.doc: Fails if ``string`` does not match ``pattern`` as a regular expression.

kw.name: Reload Page
kw.doc: Simulates user reloading page.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.msg: ${long_content} = This is a very long note content that spans multiple lines and contains a lot of text. It should be properly saved and displayed in the notes application. The content should be preserved exactly as en...
kw.arg: This is a very long note content that spans multiple lines and contains a lot of text. It should be properly saved and displayed in the notes application. The content should be preserved exactly as entered, including all spaces and line breaks.
